name: Reach the Earth!
description:
Play as an eldritch horror trying to make its way to Earth and consume your enemies to grow in size and strength! 

Prepare to die while  your skills and reaction times are tested in this unforgiving homage to classic shmups. What's the challenge? Complete three stages with 13 unique enemies and 3 bosses in a single run and you'll reach your destination... Earth! 

But beware: in this universe, dying will relentlessly reset your progress. Do you have what it takes to reach the final, coveted win screen?

Controls

WASD - moving

LMB - shooting (higher fire rate)

LMB (holding) - continuous shooting (lower fire rate but less carpal tunnel)

Have fun!

Available for purchase the PNG files (including commercial use license) with the artworks contained in the game. 

Feel free to contact me if you have any question.
